sentences: Nada Ludvig-Peƒçar (May 12, 1929 in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina - 31 March 2008 in Vienna, Austria) was a Bosnian composer.
Starting in 1969 she taught music theory at the Sarajevo Music Academy.
She retired as Professor of The Science of Musical Forms, from the Sarajevo Academy of Music in the 1990s.
